title: Automate your job search with $90 off the LazyApply Chrome plug-in
content:
Macworld

Finding a job is a full-time job. And like any full-time, automation can handle the grunt work, in this case, a lifetime license for LazyApply, available at a special price this week.

All you need to do is install the LazyApply Chrome plug-in. Fill in the necessary data, tie the extension to key sources like your LinkedIn profile, and you can apply for up to 150 jobs on major job sites that fit your criteria, every day. The plug-in also stores key analytics data so you can track how your job hunt is unfolding day to day.

LazyApply has other tools for the job hunt as well. A consultation call can help you refine your search and consider new avenues, while feedback on your CV can help you fine-tune your data to get the most from your search. These features and easy applications have earned LazyApply a 4.5 out of five stars on the Google Chrome store.

Make your job search automatic with the LazyApply Job Application Basic lifetime license for $59.97, $90 off the $149 MSRP, this week only.
